statements: SELECT * FROM IoT_Device_Performance;
SELECT device_id, device_name, temperature FROM IoT_Device_Performance WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT location, humidity, battery_level FROM IoT_Device_Performance WHERE temperature < 20;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM IoT_Device_Performance ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_type, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM IoT_Device_Performance GROUP BY device_type;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device_Performance WHERE device_type = 'Temperature Sensor';
SELECT device_name, temperature, humidity FROM IoT_Device_Performance WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoT_Device_Performance WHERE humidity > 50 AND battery_level < 50;
SELECT device_name, temperature FROM IoT_Device_Performance WHERE humidity < 30 OR temperature > 40 ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, temperature, battery_level FROM IoT_Device_Performance WHERE humidity BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY battery_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM IoTDevices WHERE firmware_version > 1.0;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceReports WHERE cpu_utilization > 70 AND memory_utilization < 30 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, location, last_reported_date FROM IoTDevices WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_id, location, firmware_version FROM IoTDevices WHERE firmware_version > 1.5 ORDER BY location ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, location, last_reported_date FROM IoTDevices WHERE location LIKE '%Room%' ORDER BY last_reported_date DESC;

SELECT device_name, report_date, cpu_utilization, memory_utilization FROM IoTDevices JOIN PerformanceReports ON IoTDevices.device_id = PerformanceReports.device_id WHERE memory_utilization > 70 AND cpu_utilization < 50;

SELECT device_name, report_date, cpu_utilization, memory_utilization, storage_utilization FROM PerformanceReports JOIN IoTDevices ON PerformanceReports.device_id = IoTDevices.device_id WHERE storage_utilization > 80 ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT device_id, device_name, location, cpu_utilization, memory_utilization, storage_utilization FROM IoTDevices LEFT JOIN PerformanceReports ON IoTDevices.device_id = PerformanceReports.device_id WHERE cpu_utilization IS NULL OR memory_utilization IS NULL OR storage_utilization IS NULL LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM device_data;
SELECT device_name, temperature FROM device_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT device_id, status FROM device_status ORDER BY last_reported_time DESC;
SELECT device_id, log_message FROM device_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT AVG(temperature) as avg_temp, AVG(humidity) as avg_humidity FROM device_data;
SELECT device_id, device_name, temperature, humidity FROM device_data WHERE humidity > 50 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT device_name, temperature, humidity FROM device_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT device_id, last_reported_time, battery_level FROM device_status WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT device_name, temperature, humidity, last_reported_time FROM device_data d JOIN device_status s ON d.device_id = s.device_id;
SELECT device_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM device_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM device_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, temperature FROM device_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT device_id, status FROM device_status WHERE last_reported < '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, longitude, address FROM device_location WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT report_id, device_id, report_type FROM device_reports WHERE report_type='error';
SELECT * FROM device_data;
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity FROM device_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT device_id, address FROM device_location ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_reports WHERE report_type = 'error';
SELECT device_id, status FROM device_status WHERE last_reported BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT device_id, timestamp, temperature FROM device_data;
SELECT error_id, error_code, error_description FROM device_errors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM device_locations WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0;
SELECT status_id, device_id, online FROM device_status WHERE online = TRUE;
SELECT report_id, device_id, report_text, report_date FROM device_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM device_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, temperature FROM device_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM device_locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 10 AND 20 AND longitude BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT status_id, device_id FROM device_status WHERE online = TRUE ORDER BY last_update ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_id, device_id, report_text, report_date FROM device_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
